EmailTemplate.description: Used to email a PDF Quote
EmailTemplate.name: PGi Standard Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: Your PGi Quote #{!Quote.QuoteNumber} is Attached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer Name,
Attached to this email is the quote for the collaboration solutions we recommend for {!Quote.BillingName}. We at PGi appreciate the opportunity to participate in your evaluation process and are excited to offer you with the best products and services in our industry. We are committed to working with you to ensure we provide you with the optimal solution for your business collaboration needs and look forward to providing you with nothing short of world-class customer service.
After you have reviewed the attached information, please let me know and we will discuss any questions you have as well as the appropriate next steps. We look forward to a great partnership between Company Name and PGi.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
